events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible because this is not what I paid for.
System detected keywords related to refund and return, categorizing this case under Refund cluster.
The case has been assigned to customer service agent Sarah M. to handle the refund request.
Hello! I’m Sarah, and I’ll assist you with your refund request. Could you please provide your order number for verification?
To process your refund, please send pictures of the wrong item you received along with the order confirmation email.
Here is my order number 12345 and attached are clear photos showing the wrong product I got instead of the one I ordered.
Thank you for the details. I have initiated the refund process for your order, and you should receive the money back within 5 to 7 business days.
Thanks for the quick response and help. I appreciate how fast you started the refund process.
Your refund request has been successfully processed. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
We just wanted to follow up to ensure you received your refund without any issues and that everything is now resolved.
No further issues reported; closing the case. Thank you for contacting support, and have a great day!
We’ve sent you a short survey to rate your satisfaction with our refund process and customer support service.
